pullrequest.title: Ensure correct transform for canonical link

content.raw:
>  I would suggest that we reconsider defining these poses as relative to the model transform

There's a lot of work still to be done on the poses. Right now we're propagating the SDF spec, where the pose is always wrt to the parent entity. There have been talks of supporting arbitrary frames of reference. A couple of considerations:

* It probably makes sense to use a single convention within the ECS
* I think we'll need a central tool which helps systems easily transform from one frame to another
content.html:
I would suggest that we reconsider defining these poses as relative to the model transform

There's a lot of work still to be done on the poses. Right now we're propagating the SDF spec, where the pose is always wrt to the parent entity. There have been talks of supporting arbitrary frames of reference. A couple of considerations:

  • It probably makes sense to use a single convention within the ECS
  • I think we'll need a central tool which helps systems easily transform from one frame to another
